editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile – we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

Carve out a new homeland by rallying Viking heroes to build cities and command armies over land and sea in this captivating strategy game.

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver devastating combos against notorious “sinners” named for literary icons in this twisted turn-based RPG.
This retro-inspired tactical RPG has a bit of everything: a great story, a magical cat and the thrill of shoving enemies off ledges.

ios.subtitle: Collect Your Squad of AI Girls

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: In this highly enjoyable mixture of strategy and tactical action, you fortify your island base with real-world weaponry, manage your economy and amass armies to storm enemies’ beaches and seize their resources. To succeed in destroying other players’ strongholds, you’ll need to think strategically and make smart decisions on the fly. Boom Beach offers polished, compelling gameplay enhanced by excellent sound, an amusing visual style, and easy-to-use controls.

editorialNotes.short: Keep customers happy as you serve food from around the world.

editorialNotes.standard: The Transformers universe is all about colorful armies locked in epic combat. Rival Kingdoms developer Space Ape nails all that in this stunning strategy wargame. Packed with enough nostalgia to fill an Energon cube, its fast-paced battles will satisfy touchscreen generals and children of the ’80s alike.

name: Cooking Crush Cooking Games
artistName: Flowmotion Entertainment: Top Free Fun Addictive Cool Games Inc.
